NIPS 2018 Workshop

26 Nov 2018

Check out our work accepted by NIPS 2018 Workshop–Machine Learning for Creativity!

XiaoJoy: Using Locally Connected CNN to Cooperate with Human Composers

Project Page

Authors: Zhihao Ouyang, Yihang Yin, Kun Yan, Jian Wu, Xiaolin Hu

Microsoft/samples-for-ai

09 Apr 2018

Microsoft/samples-for-ai is an open-source project with various samples for getting started with deep learning across TensorFlow, CNTK, Theano and more.

In Microsoft Practice Space program, our project Survey and implement new deep learning algorithms on any DL framework won the OUTSTANDING WIN award (10 out of 119), special thanks to our instructor, Researcher Tingting Qin at Microsoft Research Asia!

It’s our honor to contribute our code to Microsoft/samples-for-ai.

News Link

Progessive Growing of GANs in Keras

08 Apr 2018

The Keras implementation of NVIDIA’s Progressive Growing of GANs for Improved Quality, Stability, and Variation (ICLR 2018).

This is work is also accepted by Microsoft/samples-for-ai.

View on GitHub: Keras-progressive-growing-of-gans
